title: Boutique Atlanta Escape with Daily Breakfast & Welcome Drink
description: Enjoy high-end comfort while staying in a boutique hotel that reflects the distinct charm and character of the neighbourhood at the Hotel Indigo Atlanta - Vinings. This unique hotel places you close to Atlanta's top attractions, including Georgia Aquarium, Six Flags and the Mercedes Benz Stadium. The hotel's complimentary shuttle will get you to The Battery and Truist Park, home of the Atlanta Braves, plus enjoy easy access to premier shopping at the Vinings Jubilee, performances at the Cobb Energy Performing Arts Centre and the vibrant nightlife of Buckhead.
offer_address: 2857 Paces Ferry Rd SE, Atlanta, GA 30339, United States

vendor_name: Omni Atlanta Hotel at Centennial Park
title: Stylish Atlanta Escape in the Heart of Downtown Centennial Park District with Onsite Sports Bar
description:
Experience the heart of Atlanta from this luxurious hotel, a hop, skip and jump from the city's renowned Centennial Olympic Park. Savour Southern-inspired cuisine at New South Kitchen, enjoy a refreshing drink at the onsite sports bar Top Draft or take a dip in the outdoor heated pool.

Relax with a book or a cocktail on the sun deck while soaking in Vitamin D or build up an appetite in the state-of-the-art fitness centre. When you are ready to explore, step out and discover the World of Coca-Cola, the Georgia Aquarium and the CNN Center, all within easy walking distance.
location_description: Omni Atlanta Hotel at Centennial Park
offer_address: 190 Marietta Street NW, Atlanta, Georgia 30303, United States

title: Boutique Atlanta Escape in Vibrant Arts District with Onsite Cocktail Bars and Restaurant
description: Kimpton Shane Hotel, an IHG Hotel offers a unique and stylish experience in the heart of Atlanta's arts district. With easy access to popular attractions like the High Museum of Art, MODA and The Breman Museum, the hotel is perfectly suited to those looking for a culturally-inspired stay. After a busy day exploring Atlanta, return to the hotel for a botanically infused cocktail at onsite bar Aveline or indulge in contemporary fare at the hotel's Hartley Kitchen and Cocktails.
location_description: Kimpton Shane Hotel, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 1340 W Peachtree Street NW, Atlanta, Georgia 30309, United States

title: Elegant Mid-Century Retreat Overlooking Atlanta's Skyline with Rooftop Bar
description: Mid-century modern meets classic southern hospitality at Atlanta’s boutique-style Kimpton Sylvan Hotel, an IHG Hotel. Boasting a fantastic pool and outdoor area, this hotel cannot be missed, with a vibrant rooftop bar serving fresh cocktails with the twinkling city skyline serving as the backdrop. Experience Atlanta’s mouth-watering cuisine at The Betty restaurant, showcasing a traditional supper club and serving a contemporary spin on traditional comfort foods.
location_description: Kimpton Sylvan Hotel, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 374 East Paces Ferry Road NE, Atlanta, Georgia 30305, United States

vendor_name: Omni Hotel at the Battery Atlanta
title: Sophisticated Atlanta City Stay near The Battery & Truist Park Stadium with Rooftop Pool
description:
Experience the epitome of southeastern hospitality in the heart of Georgia's Atlanta city, perfectly situated in the vibrant Battery Atlanta district. This sophisticated hotel is a stone's throw from Truist Park Stadium - home of the Atlanta Braves - and Coca-Cola Roxy, the city's premier concert venue.

Indulge in Southern cuisine at the National Anthem restaurant, serving classic American-style foods or head to 582 Waterside Lounge & Bar to enjoy a craft cocktail by the rooftop pool bar, overlooking the bustling cityscape. Spend your day basking in the sunshine on the sundeck, or retreat to the comfort of a private cabana.
location_description: Omni Hotel at the Battery Atlanta
offer_address: 2625 Circle 75 Parkway, Atlanta, GA 30339, United States

title: Glamorous Atlanta Airport Escape with Rooftop Lounge Overlooking Runway
description: Get up close to all the action of Atlanta Airport's runway or a Porsche handling course with a stay at the sophisticated Kimpton Overland Atlanta Airport, an IHG Hotel. Soundproofed windows in the sophisticated motorsports-inspired rooms and suites ensure a comfortable atmosphere, while panoramic views await from The Rooftop at Overland. Fancy a bite? Discover Southern-inspired dishes at APRON restaurant.
location_description: Kimpton Overland Hotel Atlanta Airport, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 2 Porsche Drive, Atlanta, Georgia, GA 30354, United States
